21109.en: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Watch out! Get down! Get down!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21109.ja: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「危ない！　伏せるでアールッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21109.ko: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 위험해! 엎드리거~라!!<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21109.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>危险！快趴下是也！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21109.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>危險！快趴下是也！！<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29448.en:
That was a close call. If I had touched that beam of light, I would have ended up like that traveler over
there. I'd end up like that traveler over there.
29448.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「危ないところだったね。
　あの光線に　さわったら最後……。
　あそこの旅人みたいに　なってたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29448.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 큰일 날 뻔했군.
　그 광선에 맞았으면…….
　저 여행자처럼 됐을 것이니~라.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29448.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好险啊，
要是碰到那个光线就完了……
会变得跟那边的旅行者一样。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29448.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>好險喔，
要是碰到那個光線就完了……
會變得跟那邊的旅人一樣。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21110.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>But my bad premonition was right on
target! I didn't expect him to appear
so soon.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21110.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「しかし　悪い予感が　的中したのでアール……。
　こんなにも早く　ヤツが現れるとは……。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21110.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그나저나 불길한 예감이 적중했느니~라…….
　이렇게 빨리 놈이 나타날 줄이야…….<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21110.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>不祥的预感应验了是也……
实在没想到，这家伙这么快就出现了……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21110.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>不祥的預感應驗了是也……
實在沒想到，這傢伙這麼快就出現了……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21111.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>By the way, what is <pc>
doing here! I wonder?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21111.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「……ところで　<pc>は
　こんな所に　何をしにきたのでアールか？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21111.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: ……그런데 {pc}|hpp(은,는)
　이런 곳에 뭘 하러 온 것이~냐?<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21111.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……话说回来，<pc>，
你来这里做什么是也？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21111.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……話說回來，<pc>，
你來這裡做什麼是也？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21112.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>Hmmm, Boss Hottsi was attacked by a
monster around here, so I'm here to
investigate! I see.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21112.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。ホッツィ親方が
　この辺りで　魔物に襲われたから
　その調査に来たのでアールか。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21112.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 이 주변에서
　홋찌 감독님이 마물에게 공격받은
　사건을 조사하러 왔단 말이지.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21112.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……嗯，霍崔老大在这附近
被怪物袭击了，
所以你才来调查是也？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21112.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……嗯，霍崔師傅在這附近被怪物襲擊了，
所以你才來調查是也？<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21113.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>I'm sure that monster is the one that
attacked Boss Hottsi. We came here
after him.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21113.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「……ホッツィ親方を襲ったのは
　あの魔物に　まちがいないだろうね。
　ボクらも　ヤツを追って　ここにきたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21113.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: ……홋찌 감독님을 공격한 건
　분명히 그 마물일 거다.
　우리도 놈을 쫓아 이곳에 온 것이니~라.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21113.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……攻击霍崔老大的
一定是那怪物。
我们也是追着那家伙来到这里的。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21113.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>……攻擊霍崔師傅的
一定就是那怪物吧。
我們也是追著那傢伙來到這裡的。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21114.en:
The monster's name is Magical Beast Byblos, a terrifying creature that lives by sucking the souls of people
with the rays of light emitted from its mouth.
21114.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「あの魔物の名は　魔獣ビュブロス……。
　クチから発する光線で　人の魂を
　吸い取って生きる　恐ろしいヤツさ。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21114.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 그 마물의 이름은 마수 비블로스…….
　입에서 광선을 뿜어 사람의 영혼을
　앗아 가는 무시무시한 녀석이다.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21114.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那怪物叫魔兽朱拜勒斯……
它会从嘴巴射出光线，以
吸收人的灵魂为生，极为恐怖。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21114.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那頭怪物叫做魔獸朱拜勒斯……
牠會從嘴巴射出光線，以
吸收人的靈魂為生，極為恐怖。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21115.en:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>The traveler lying there like a dead
fish must have been exposed to that
beam of light. Poor thing.<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21115.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>「あそこで　ぬけがらのように倒れてる旅人は
　その光線を　くらっちゃったんだね……。
　かわいそうに……。<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21115.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>: 저기 빈껍데기처럼 쓰러져 있는 여행자는
　그 광선을 맞은 걸 테지…….
　가엾게도…….<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21115.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那个像空壳一样倒在路边的旅行者，
八成就是中了那道光线……
真可怜……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21115.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00536 _normal m00001>那個像空殼一樣倒在路邊的旅行者，
八成就是中了那道光線……
真可憐……<stop_lip_animation n00536 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21116.en:
Byblos headed for Mogarim Highway. If left unchecked, he will attack the Town of Agrani in search of more
souls.
21116.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「……ビュブロスは　モガリム街道に向かった。
　このまま　放っておけば　ヤツは
　大量の魂を求め　アグラニの町を襲うだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21116.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: ……비블로스는 모가리움 가도로 갔네.
　이대로 놔두면 놈은 더 많은 영혼을 노리고
　아그라니 마을을 공격할 터.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21116.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……朱拜勒斯朝摩加利姆街道去了。
放着不管的话，那家伙一定会
为了吸食灵魂而攻击阿古拉尼镇。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21116.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……朱拜勒斯朝摩加利姆幹道去了。
放著不管的話，那傢伙一定會
為了吸食靈魂而攻擊阿古拉尼鎮。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21117.en:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>But I won't let that happen. I and my
staff will take care of him. Tell
Hottsi not to worry.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21117.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「……だが　そうはさせん。
　ヤツは　わしと　この杖が　なんとかする。
　ホッツィには　心配するなと伝えておくがよい。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21117.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 그렇게 둘 수는 없지.
　놈은 나와 이 지팡이가 처리하겠네.
　홋찌에게는 걱정 말라고 전해 주게나.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21117.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……绝不能让它得逞。
它就由我和这把杖对付，
告诉霍崔不用担心。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21117.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>……絕不能讓牠得逞。
牠就由我和這把法杖對付，
告訴霍崔不用擔心。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21118.en: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>Well then, I'll see you again.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21118.ja: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>「それでは　また会おう。<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21118.ko: <start_lip_sync n00506 _normal m00001>: 그럼 다음에 또 보세.<stop_lip_animation n00506 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21119.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Lunana! What's a rebellious guy like
you doing in Agrani after all this
time?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21119.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ルナナ！　お前みたいな　はねっ返りが
　今さら　アグラニに　何しにきやがった！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21119.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 루나나! 이 사고뭉치가!
　뭐 하러 아그라니에 돌아온 거냐!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21119.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>露娜娜！你这臭丫头，事到如今，
还回来阿古拉尼做什么？！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21119.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>露娜娜！妳這臭丫頭，事到如今，
還回來阿古拉尼做什麼！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21120.en:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>What? Who do you think is responsible
for the revival of this town? It's all
thanks to me!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21120.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「なんですって……！？
　誰のおかげで　この町が再興したと思ってんの？
　全部　あたしの　おかげでしょうが！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21120.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 뭐라고……!?
　이 마을이 누구 덕분에 되살아났는데?
　다 내 덕분이잖아!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21120.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>你说什么？！
也不想想，这个城镇是靠谁才复兴的？
不全都是我的功劳吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21120.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>你說什麼！？
也不想想，這個市鎮是靠誰才復興的？
不全都是我的功勞嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21121.ja: <start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「なっ……　なにぃ……！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21121.ko: <start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 뭐…… 뭐가 어째……!?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21122.en:
Today I'm going to ask you to write a thank-you note for it. I am the hero who saved Agrani! I'm sure the world
will naturally look at me with a title like ''Hero who saved Agrani!
21122.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「今日は　それに対する　礼状を書いてもらうわ。
　アグラニを救った英雄！　とでも肩書きがつけば
　世間の目も　おのずと　あたしに向くでしょ？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21122.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 오늘은 그 일에 대한 감사장을 받으러 왔어.
　아그라니를 구한 영웅이란 타이틀이 생기면
　세간에서도 날 주목하지 않겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21122.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>今天我要你写一封感谢信。
拯救阿古拉尼的英雄，拥有这个头衔后，
世人的目光一定会聚集在我身上。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21122.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>今天我要你寫一封感謝信。
拯救阿古拉尼的英雄，擁有這個頭銜後，
世人的目光一定會聚集在我身上。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21123.en:
Ka~! What are you talking about? We suffered a terrible fate because we were swept away by your stupid
ambitions!
21123.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「か～っ！　なに言ってやがる！
　お前の　くだらん野望に　振りまわされて
　オレらは　ヒドイ目にあったんだよ！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21123.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 크악~! 무슨 소릴 하는 거냐!
　네 시시한 야망 때문에
　우린 죽다 살아났다고!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21123.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>什么？！谁理你啊！
你无聊的野心之前
可是把我们害惨了！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21123.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>什麼！？誰理妳啊！
妳無聊的野心之前
可是把我們害慘了！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21124.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Your late father, Father Holta, was a
man of character who was truly devoted
to Agrani. And you, his daughter.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21124.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「お前の亡くなった親父さん……　ホルタ神父は
　本当に　アグラニに尽くした　人格者だった。
　それなのに　娘の　お前は……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21124.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 돌아가신 네 아버지…… 홀터 신부는
　아그라니를 위해 헌신한 인격자였다.
　그런데 그 딸인 너는…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21124.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>你已故的父亲……霍尔达神父
为了阿古拉尼肝脑涂地，尽职尽责。
但身为她的女儿，你却……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21124.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>妳已故的父親……霍爾達神父
為了阿古拉尼肝腦塗地，盡職盡責。
但身為她的女兒，妳卻……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21125.en:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Shut up! You're not my problem! I will
do whatever it takes to get ahead in
this world! That's my way!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21125.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「うるさい！　父さんは　関係ないでしょ！
　あたしは　この世界で　のし上がるためなら
　手段は選ばない！　それが　あたしのやり方よ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21125.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 시끄러워! 아버지랑은 상관없잖아!
　난 성공하기 위해서라면 무슨 짓이든 할 거야!
　그게 내 방식이야!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21125.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>要你管！这关爸爸什么事？！
为了出人头地，
我一向不择手段！这就是我做事的风格。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21125.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>要你管！這關爸爸什麼事！？
為了出人頭地，
我一向不擇手段！這就是我做事的風格。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21126.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Hmm. Nothing I can say will make sense
to you. I'm not writing you a thank-
you note. Get the hell out of here!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21126.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ふん。お前には　何を言ってもムダだな。
　オレは　礼状なんか書かねえぞ。
　さっさと帰んな！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21126.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 흥, 네겐 무슨 말을 해도 소용없겠군.
　감사장을 써 줄 마음 따윈 없다.
　당장 돌아가!<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21126.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哼！简直是对牛弹琴，
我才不写什么感谢信，
你快离开吧！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21126.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哼！簡直是對牛彈琴，
我才不寫什麼感謝信，
妳快離開吧！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21128.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Oh, I'm sorry! I didn't know you were
here. Thanks for your hard work. Come
on, let's hear all about it.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21128.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「おっと　すまねえ！　来てくれてたのか。
　ご苦労だったな。さあ　こっちに来て
　くわしい話を　聞かせてくれよ。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21128.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 이런, 미안하군! 와 있었나.
　수고가 많았다. 자, 이리 와서
　자세한 이야기를 들려다오.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21128.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哎呀，不好意思！原来你来了。
辛苦了。好，赶快过来，
把事情一五一十告诉我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21128.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>哎呀，不好意思！原來你來了。
辛苦你啦。好，趕快過來，
把事情一五一十告訴我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28517.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>So what'd you think? Did you find out
who the monster is that attacked me?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28517.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「……で　どうだったい？
　オレを襲った魔物の正体　わかったか？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28517.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: ……그래서, 어떻게 됐지?
　날 공격한 마물의 정체는 알아냈나?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28517.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……所以，怎么样？
你搞清攻击我的怪物真面目了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28517.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……所以，怎麼樣？
你搞清攻擊我的怪物的真面目了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28518.en:
<pc> told Boss Hottsi what
happened at Gatara Fields.
28518.ja:
<pc>は　ホッツィ親方に
ガタラ原野での出来事を　話した。
28518.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 홋찌 감독에게
가타라 벌판에서 있었던 일을 이야기했다.
28518.zh-Hans:
<pc>将在加塔拉原野发生的事
告诉霍崔老大。
28518.zh-Hant:
<pc>將在加塔拉原野
發生的事告訴了霍崔師傅。

21130.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>Oh. Sage Broggen appeared at the place
where I was attacked? That's a
coincidence. So what happened?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21130.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「……ほう。オレが襲われた場所に
　賢者ブロッゲンさまが　現れたってのか。
　そいつは　奇遇だな。それで？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21130.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 내가 공격당한 곳에
　현자 브록겐 님이 나타나셨단 말이지.
　신기한 우연이군. 그래서?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21130.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……哦，贤者布罗根大人
出现在我被袭击的地方了？
这可真巧啊。然后呢？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21130.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……是喔，賢者布羅根大人
出現在我被襲擊的地方了？
這可真巧啊。然後呢？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21131.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>What the hell? The monster that
attacked me was a terrifying soul-
sucking hexenbiest?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21131.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「……なっ　なんだと！？
　オレを襲った魔物は　魂を吸い取る
　恐ろしい魔獣だったってのか！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21131.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: ……뭐, 뭐라!?
　날 공격한 마물이 영혼을 흡수하는
　무시무시한 마수였다고!?<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21131.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……你、你说什么？！
攻击我的怪物，
是会吸收灵魂的恐怖魔兽？！<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21131.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>……你、你說什麼！？
攻擊我的怪物，
是會吸收靈魂的恐怖魔獸！？<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21132.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>And this Magical Beast Byblos was
planning to attack Agrani? This guy is
a whopper.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21132.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「しかも　その魔獣ビュブロスって野郎は
　アグラニを　襲うつもりでいただと……？
　こいつぁ　おったまげたぜ……。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21132.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 게다가 그 마수 비블로스란 녀석이
　아그라니를 공격하려 했다고……?
　맙소사…….<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21132.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>而且那个叫魔兽朱拜勒斯的混账，
本来还打算攻击阿古拉尼……？
也太可怕了吧……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21132.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>而且那個叫魔獸朱拜勒斯的混帳，
本來還打算攻擊阿古拉尼……？
也太可怕了吧……<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21133.en:
Well, if that Sage Broggen is going to take care of it, I guess I can rest easy. That's the best thing that could
have happened to me.
21133.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「ま…まあ　あの賢者ブロッゲンさまが
　なんとかしてくれるってえなら　安心か……。
　それだけが　不幸中の幸いだったってワケだ。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21133.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 그… 그래도 현자 브록겐 님께서
　해결해 주신다고 하니 한시름 놓이는군…….
　그거 하나는 불행 중 다행이야.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21133.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>不……不过，既然贤者布罗根大人
说他会想办法解决，那倒也不必担心……
这算是不幸中的万幸了。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21133.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>不……不過，既然賢者布羅根大人
說他會想辦法解決，那倒也不必擔心……
這算是不幸中的大幸了。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21134.en:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>All right! Thanks for your help. I
understand the monster that attacked
me. Now, here's your reward. Take it.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21134.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>「よし！　ご苦労だったな。
　オレを襲った魔物の件は　よ～くわかったぜ。
　さあ　これは報酬だ。受け取ってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21134.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>: 좋아! 고생 많았다.
　날 공격한 마물에 관해서는 잘 알았다.
　자, 이건 보수다. 받아다오.<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21134.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>好！辛苦你了，
我被怪物攻击一事已经理清了。
来，这是你的报酬，收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21134.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00387 _normal m00001>好！辛苦你啦，
我被怪物攻擊一事已經釐清了。
來，這是你的報酬，收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00387 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

21135.en:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Do I know you from somewhere? Well, if
I did, I don't remember anything about
it.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21135.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あなた　どこかで会ったかしら？
　まあ　もし　そうだとしても
　あたしは　いっさい記憶にないんだけど。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21135.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 너, 나랑 어디서 만났던가?
　뭐, 만약 그렇다 해도
　난 하나도 기억 안 나지만.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21135.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我们之前见过面吗？
算了，即使有，
我也没印象了。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21135.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我們之前有見過面嗎？
算了，即使有，
我也沒印象了。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21136.en:
But for someone with a face that lacks impact, you sure have a lot of interesting material. I'm interested
in you.
21136.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「でも　インパクトに欠ける　顔に似合わず
　ずいぶんと　面白いネタを持ってるのね。
　あたし　あなたに興味が　わいたわ。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21136.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 따분하게 생긴 얼굴과 달리
　꽤나 재미있는 이야기를 알고 있네.
　너한테 흥미가 생겼어.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21136.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>虽然你的脸不会给人留下什么深刻的印象，
但还是会和有趣的事扯上关系嘛。
我对你产生兴趣了。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21136.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>雖然你的臉不會給人留下什麼深刻的印象，
但還是會和有趣的事情扯上關係嘛。
我對你產生興趣了。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21137.en:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Sage Broggen to the mysterious
Hexenbiest. I'll have to hear about it
sometime.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21137.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「謎の魔獣に　賢者ブロッゲン……。
　その話　今度　ゆっくり
　聞かせてもらうわよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21137.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 수수께끼의 마수와 현자 브록겐…….
　그 얘기, 다음에 자세히
　들려주기 바라…….<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21137.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>神秘的魔兽，贤者布罗根……
之后你再慢慢
把这些事情说给我听吧……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21137.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>神祕的魔獸，賢者布羅根……
之後你再慢慢
把這些事情說給我聽吧……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
